DEFINITION of 'Department Of Labor (DOL)' The Department of Labor is a U.S. cabinet-level agency responsible for enforcing federal labor standards and promoting workers' wellbeing. BREAKING DOWN 'Department Of Labor (DOL)' The Department of Labor (DOL) works to improve working conditions and the overall health of the labor market.
